src:
Burkina Faso governor says 37 dead after gunmen ambush a convoy of mining employees working for ...
06 Nov 2019, 23:18 by EndPlay
OUAGADOUGOU, Burkina Faso - OUAGADOUGOU, Burkina Faso (AP) - Burkina Faso governor says 37 dead after gunmen ambush a convoy of mining employees working for Canadian company.
